patches./Deployment-istio-galley.yaml:
apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: galley
    chart: galley-1.0.3
    heritage: Tiller
    istio: galley
    release: istio
  name: istio-galley
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      $setElementOrder/containers:
      - name: validator
      containers:
      - name: validator
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: FORKED_INITIAL_DELAY_SECONDS
patches./Service-istio-ingressgateway.yaml:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  annotations: null
  labels:
    app: istio-ingressgateway
    chart: gateways-1.0.3
    heritage: Tiller
    istio: ingressgateway
    release: istio
  name: istio-ingressgateway
  namespace: default
spec:
  type: FORKED_SERVICE_TYPE
patches./Service-istio-policy.yaml:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  labels:
    chart: mixer-1.0.3
    istio: mixer
    release: istio
  name: istio-policy
  namespace: default
spec:
  $setElementOrder/ports:
  - port: 9091
  - port: 15004
  - port: FORKED_HTTP_MONITORING
  ports:
  - name: http-monitoring
    port: FORKED_HTTP_MONITORING
  - $patch: delete
    port: 9093

metadata.name: istio
metadata.releaseNotes: Support setting FAIL_OPEN for istio-policy service (#9493)
